programme.title: Love In Between
programme.desc: Damian falls in love with Chioma and treats her badly. Chioma becomes lucky when she meets chief who treats her like a queen.

programme.title: My Ex, My Mother And I
programme.desc: Austin is treated wrongly by his ex when he goes looking for a job in her company. However, everyone is shocked when the manager introduce the owner of the company.

programme.title: Painful Regret
programme.desc: Ndidi and her children terrorize their family members and blame them for their misfortune in their husbands house.

programme.title: Love Never Seen
programme.desc: Tony will lose his love, Oluchi, a woman who has done everything for him. This war started when Adam ask her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: When Trust Dies
programme.desc: Avalon has a peaceful and loving home until he meets with his ex, Vincentia. This meeting is about to destroy everything that Avalon holds dear, including his beloved marriage.

programme.title: Royal Turmoil
programme.desc: Izunna dedicates his life to his fathers company, following all the rules and working tirelessly. When Prince Obieze returns home, the King hands everything to him.

programme.title: To Love A Mechanic
programme.desc: Jerry has been through a lot in relationship and decides to disguise himself as a mechanic in other in other to find a true love. Will he find it?

programme.title: My Sweat
programme.desc: A woman single handedly raised her children by doing different jobs, she vowed never to allow the kids extend any form of love to anybody.

programme.title: Their Mothers Eye
programme.desc: Susan manipulates her husband and makes him hate everyone around them because she wants him back.

programme.title: Beyond Limits
programme.desc: Austin treats his wife Daisy with so much hate and disgust, but things are about to change and get worse when Austins younger brother Alex moves into the house.

programme.title: Beauty Not Enough
programme.desc: Ogonna leaves a beautiful family and gets married to beautiful Ifesinachi, little did he know that he just signs his doom.

programme.title: Sister Ada
programme.desc: Ada refuse eight suitors because of Ikenna who sacrificed everything for her. Her family will do everything to make sure the marriage does not work, but what Ada did change everything.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Onochies plans are on the brink of failure. Nnannas plot to get Adanna back fails, and Bianoyerem finds a way to get the woman of his dreams.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Friendships are put to the test in the light of the latest disruption in Mgberi.

programme.title: Hole In My Heart
programme.desc: In the lead-up to their 10th anniversary, Donald, married to Stella with three daughters, receives constant calls from a secret lover who has his child.

programme.title: Staged
programme.desc: Zainab lied to her friends about getting married, now she has to stage a proper wedding as her Ego is at stake.

programme.title: House Of Trouble
programme.desc: Mama Emeka is deeply frustrated by the constant trouble caused by her children. However, the chaos in the house is about to settle as Emeka has finally exposed.

programme.title: Blood Of An Imbecile
programme.desc: Richard exploited his only brother, Obinna, for money, resulting in a curse that links their fates. Whatever happens to Obinna also happens to Richard.

programme.title: Last Husband
programme.desc: Nonso frustrates every woman that comes into his brothers life, because he fears losing him to them. Now Becky is here to stay but will he let this happen?

programme.title: My Benefit
programme.desc: Osundu is treated with disgust while working with the queen and her princesses, this continues until the princes were ripe to get married and a decision is made.

programme.title: Family War
programme.desc: Ugodiya and Obiageli, rival wives, face a new threat as their children join a dangerous cult. Driven by a thirst for power, they are willing to harm their own family members.

programme.title: Just After Life
programme.desc: Azuka is given the last pebble that will bring a man into her life. He will take care of her, change her life, but will never marry her, because he will not last long.

programme.title: Threeway
programme.desc: In a bid to fulfill her husbands greatest fantasy to celebrate their anniversary, Chioma and her husband are being extorted, and the blackmailers want more than they expect.

programme.title: Big Brother Naija: Daily Shows
programme.desc: In Biggies House, 24 hours brings romance, ships sink, and shifting alliances. Missed the excitement? Catch all the drama in todays daily wrap of the Big Brother Naija action.

programme.title: Enakhe
programme.desc: Stones efforts yield a surprising outcome. Jacinta and Cali reach a point of inevitability. Sinzu reveals information that bears repercussions for several parties.

programme.title: My Siblings And I
programme.desc: A narrative where we see the happenings through the eyes of each sibling in the family, everyones life is subjective to the opinion of others.

programme.title: Jemeji
programme.desc: Matron reinforces Fontons faith in himself. Oviyon cautions Senami against talking to the police. Kingsley begins to suspect Senami.

programme.title: Ring Of Lies
programme.desc: Gugu is cross-examined and made out to be something shes not. Gazini asks Rendani a big question but is unhappy with the answer.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Following the instructions of Franks parents, Akin arrives to ensure that the Flatmates are out of the house.

programme.title: Hustle

programme.title: Isibaya

programme.desc: An intimate portrait of a 9-year-old sociopaths growing fascination with death.

programme.title: Nightmare Pageant Moms

programme.title: Autumn In The City
programme.desc: An enjoyable romance film about Piper, who moves to New York City to find herself. There, she meets Austin, a jaded writer, and they discover the citys beauty together.

programme.title: The Nutcracker And The Magic Flute
programme.desc: The classic Nutcracker tale gets a refreshing twist. As Marie wishes to escape her troubles, she shrinks to the size of her toys, which all come to life.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion Of The Cimarron
programme.desc: This Oscar nominee for Best Animated Feature film sees a young mustang stallion become the leader of his herd. But when he is captured, hes forced to fight for his freedom.

programme.title: How The Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss How The Grinch Stole Christmas. Jim Carrey plays the infamous Grinch, a creature who hates Christmas and plots to steal it.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: Looking for a family film with a moral and Jerry Seinfelds observational humour? Then the story of Barry, the bee who leaves the hive for a big adventure, is just up your path.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: In this colossal action drama from director Peter Jackson, a film crew heads to a remote island to shoot a movie but encounters a legendary beast that could spell their end.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: An ensemble cast brings the legendary comic book league to life in this superhero movie. When Earth is attacked by an alien force, Batman recruits the help of the planets mightiest heroes.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Steve Martin and Alec Baldwin star in this rom-com about a love triangle that sees a divorced woman have an affair with her ex-husband while dating another man.

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: Based on the popular National Lampoon franchise. A family stuck in the same holiday routine decides to change things up, leading to a world of chaos.

programme.title: White People Money
programme.desc: In this hilarious satire, a couple learns that having a lot of money comes with many troubles after they win $1 billion and try to keep it a secret from everyone.

programme.title: Prisoner Of Love
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life romantic crime story. A corrections officer falls in love with an inmate and helps him break him out of jail.

programme.title: A Christmas Fumble
programme.desc: An enjoyable holiday romantic comedy. When an ambitious crisis manager is assigned a sports anchor who turns out to be her ex-boyfriend, old feelings resurface.

programme.title: Two Tails
programme.desc: A crazy, wacky, animated adventure. After becoming best friends, a beaver and a cat embark on a dangerous mission to save their friends who have been abducted by aliens.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now...
programme.sub-title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.

programme.title: The Barkers: Mind The Cats!
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale 2
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd star in this sequel about friendship as a group of people in a marine hospital try and help a dolphin find a companion.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: When the murderous Lord Shen threatens China with a terrifying new weapon, Po must face a truth he never expected and defeat Shen for the good of Kung Fu.

programme.title: Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson and Thomas Jane star in this deep-sea shark thriller. Scientists create killer sharks while searching for a cure for Alzheimers disease. Now they are being hunted.

programme.title: The Stand In
programme.desc: This funny rom-com stars Drew Barrymore in a dual role. When Candy is sentenced to rehab, she sends her acting double, but things take a turn as her stand-in takes over her life.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Tom Cruise messes with forces unknown in this reboot. While trying to steal artefacts in the Middle East, a soldier accidentally awakens an ancient, malevolent princess.

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Hugh Jackman takes on the role of the legendary monster killer in this action adventurer. Follow the hunt as he fights to stop Dracula before he can hatch his twisted, dark plan.

programme.title: Dead Trigger: Unkilled
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic film that sees an elite soldier unit stepping in to save humanity when a virus decimates the world and creates zombie hordes.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: Kingdom Of Heaven
programme.desc: The Crusades frames the tale of a young Frenchman who discovers his destiny as a knight, then lives out what that glorious title really means.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: A New York City cop faces overwhelming odds when his Christmas visit to California is interrupted by a terrorist invasion of his estranged wifes office building.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Polar opposites Jamie, a womanizing pharma salesman and Maggie, a mysterious free spirit, find themselves taken by surprise when they fall victim to lifes ultimate drug: love

programme.title: Date Movie
programme.desc: Date Movie tells the story of hopeless romantic Julia Jones, who has finally met the man of her dreams, the very British Grant Funkyerdoder.

programme.title: Five Feet Apart
programme.desc: Two teens with cystic fibrosis meet in a hospital and fall in love, though their disease means they must avoid close physical contact.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: A successful, single businesswoman who dreams of having a baby discovers she is infertile and hires a working class woman to be her unlikely surrogate.

programme.title: Mortdecai
programme.desc: Juggling angry Russians, the British MI5 and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue, Charlie Mordecai races to recover a stolen painting.

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Whoopi Goldberg stars as a sassy lounge singer forced to hide from the mob in the last place anyone would ever look for her in a convent.

programme.title: Cheaper By The Dozen
programme.desc: While raising twelve children, a middle-aged couple decides to pursue more demanding careers, only to discover that big families and big careers are a difficult mix.

programme.title: Meet The Spartans
programme.desc: From the creators of Date Movie comes this tongue-in-cheek parody of the sword-and-sandal epics, dubbed Meet The Spartans.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: Based on the popular Marvel comic book, this action-packed saga stars Jennifer Garner as Elektra, a warrior-assassin who fights the ultimate battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Mortal Engines
programme.desc: Hundreds of years after civilization was destroyed by a cataclysmic event, a mysterious young woman, emerges as the only one who can stop London.

programme.title: Get Rich Or Die Tryin
programme.desc: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from a life of crime to pursue his passion of rap music.

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: John Wick is a former hitman grieving the loss of his true love. When his home is broken into, robbed, and his dog killed, he is forced to return to action to exact revenge.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

programme.title: Runner Runner
programme.desc: A college student takes the ultimate gamble when he goes to Costa Rica to confront the online gaming tycoon who cheated him out of his winnings.

programme.title: Marilyn Monroe: Beauty Is Pain

programme.title: Life In A Year

programme.title: The Real Angelina

programme.title: Aloha

programme.title: Kill Em All
programme.desc: Wounded men arrive at a hospital thats closed apart from the ER. Then, men with guns turn up and start shooting - but who is killing who, and why?

programme.title: Never Back Down: No Surrender
programme.desc: A former MMA champion is on the comeback trail to regain his title.

programme.title: Running With The Devil
programme.desc: A drug kingpin sends two of his top people to find out why a consignment of cocaine was highjacked and cut while en route from Mexico to Canada.

programme.title: Beta Test
programme.desc: A champion gamer discovers events in a new video game are being mirrored in real life and teams up with the games protagonist to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: Cinderella And The Secret Prince
programme.desc: Cinderella must save the day after learning at the Royal Ball that an evil witch has turned the Prince into a mouse and replaced him with an impostor.

programme.title: Princess And The Dragon
programme.desc: In this animated tale, a young princess is transported by a magical book to an enchanted realm full of dragons and other extraordinary creatures.

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: Sparks fly when a troubled street kid doing community service meets a focused ballet student looking for a partner for her dance routine.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: When the worlds greatest secret agents are kidnapped, the only people who can save them are their children.

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island Of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: On the strange island where a mad scientist lives, the Cortez kids find that their gadgets fail them as they face rival child spies.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
programme.desc: The junior secret agents must fight their way through a perilous virtual reality world.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: The fastest and sassiest of New York cabbies is derailed by an inept and carless cop on the trail of a gang of beautiful Brazilian bank robbers.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in his third outing as secret agent Ethan Hunt, here trying to outwit a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: An elderly martial arts master teaches karate to a lonely and bullied teenager in this classic coming-of-age story.

programme.title: Jiu Jitsu
programme.desc: When the Earth is threatened by an alien warrior, a wise-cracking jiu jitsu trainer helps an injured master fighter prepare for the ultimate battle.

programme.title: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
programme.desc: Jason Scott Lee stars as Bruce Lee, the martial arts legend who left his humble childhood on the streets of Hong Kong to become a Hollywood star.

programme.title: Shot Caller
programme.desc: A newly-released prisoner is forced to work with a brutal gang to pull off a major crime on the streets of southern California.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Riot delves into the gritty underworld of a dystopian city where a rogue detective battles corruption, fighting the treacherous and more for justice.

programme.title: Crown Vic
programme.desc: In the pulse-pounding drama Crown Vic, two LAPD officers have to navigate a dangerous night shift, testing their limits and loyalty along the way.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the best action movies. In each episode, youll get all the secrets straight from your favourite action heroes.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of the best action movies. In each episode, youll get all the secrets straight from your favourite action heroes.

programme.title: Spies In Disguise
programme.desc: Lance Sterling is a suave super-spy, the best in the business. But when he gets turned into a pigeon, scientist Walter must save the world instead.

programme.title: Sing 2
programme.desc: The gang aims to prove to a talent scout theyre worthy of the big time. But can they persuade a star to come out of retirement and join in the fun?

programme.title: Step Up 3D
programme.desc: A group of street dancers team up for a epic battle against the worlds best hip-hop dancers in a showdown that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: An unhappy middle-aged man gets the chance to relive his teenage years all over again after jumping through a time vortex.

programme.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks: The...
programme.sub-title: Alvin And The Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
programme.desc: The famous chipmunk trio return to deal with the pressures of school, celebrity and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: In this sixth entry in the action franchise, Ethan Hunt has his hands full after learning a terrorist group plans to detonate three nuclear devices.

programme.title: Rush Hour
programme.desc: Its a clash of tempers, personalities and cultures when a Chinese detective and an American cop work together to find a diplomats missing daughter.

programme.title: The Shepherd
programme.desc: A former New Orleans cop goes up against Mexican drug smugglers and their former special forces associates in a Texas town.

programme.title: Half Past Dead
programme.desc: While on an undercover operation in a hi-tech prison complex, an FBI agent learns of an ambitious criminal plot to seize a vast fortune in gold.

programme.title: Jiu Jitsu
programme.desc: When the Earth is threatened by an alien warrior, a wise-cracking jiu jitsu trainer helps an injured master fighter prepare for the ultimate battle.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: A retired mobster seeks redemption but faces betrayal and vengeance in a deadly game of loyalty and revenge in this spellbinder.

programme.title: Hollow Man II
programme.desc: A web of conspiracies comes to light as a scientist attempts to evade an invisible assassin whose condition is slowly destroying his body and mind.

programme.title: The Queen Of The South
programme.desc: Santiago approaches Teresa, leaving Sheila hurt and betrayed. Meanwhile, Cespedes makes his feelings towards Teresa very clear.

programme.title: The Way To Paradise
programme.desc: Miguel warns Catalina that Martin escaped and that he plans to kill her. Calvo picks up Hilda from the hospital. Martin and Villa travel to Colombia.

programme.title: Cacau
